text: Hello！I see there's this hype around the new AD called "Diffractor"(its odd that it doesn't even have a GH page:slightly_frowning_face:). Do you guys know anything about it？Yao uses Zygote for AD right？

elements.text: Hello！I see there's this hype around the new AD called "Diffractor"(its odd that it doesn't even have a GH page
). Do you guys know anything about it？Yao uses Zygote for AD right？

text: yao implements its own AD engine that make use of the reversibility. You can wrap that as an adjoint in Zygote or whatever you want

text: Diffractor is the next gen Zygote

text: the code of Diffractor is scattered in Julia compiler, gist at the moment. The main issue is about opaque closure in julia compiler
